name: DiastolicBloodPressureLessThan90
title: Diastolic Blood Pressure Less Than 90
description: Value set includes CPT Level II codes and active & inactive HCPCS codes that capture diastolic blood < 90.   Can also includes codes that represent diastolic blood pressure < 80 or 80-89.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Most recent diastolic blood pressure < 90),(Data Element Scope: Representative diastolic blood pressure < 90),(Inclusion Criteria: HCPCS codes that represent only a diastolic blood pressure < 90),(Exclusion Criteria: Systolic blood pressure codes, codes that represent both a systolic and diastolic reading)

contains.display: Most recent diastolic blood pressure less than 80 mm Hg (HTN, CKD, CAD) (DM)
Most recent diastolic blood pressure less than 80 mm hg (htn, ckd, cad) (dm)
Most recent diastolic blood pressure 80-89 mm Hg (HTN, CKD, CAD) (DM)
Most recent diastolic blood pressure 80-89 mm hg (htn, ckd, cad) (dm)
Most recent diastolic blood pressure < 90 mmhg
